column1: '''Mallos''' was a flower that grew in the vales of [[Lebennin]] in [[Gondor]]
column2: described as having the shape and colour of a golden bell.<ref>{{RK|V9}}</ref>

column3: p. 100</ref> apparently consisting of elements related to ''[[malt]]'' ("gold") + ''[[loth]]''/''[[loss]]'' ("flower"/"snow"). The [[Westron]] name of the flower is given as Goldenbell.{{fact}}
